/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the towering buildings that flank it. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the overcast sky, their glass facades reflecting the muted light of the day. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant energy. Despite the gray sky, the image exudes a sense of calm, as if the city has paused for a moment, allowing us to take in its grandeur.
